title: 巨星 [True Star]
description: King of the silver screen, Feinnes·Tang, passed away after years of battling with heart disease. He later woke up to find himself in the body of an outdated idol starlet. Since the heavens has given him a new opportunity, then he should enjoy life to the best he can, and reach the summit of the entertainment industry once again.Genre: Drama, Showbiz, Yaoi, Drama, Josei, Romance, Shounen AiOriginal Language: Chinese
author: 万灭之殇
